longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Netherlands are allowed to enter with an
  expired passport. The passport is accepted when expired for
  a maximum of 5 years. 
- Nationals of Netherlands traveling without a passport must
  have a document accepted for entry, valid on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued to nationals of Netherlands.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Foreign minors (under 18 years of age)
   For more information see
  www.sef.pt
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Netherlands will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Netherlands are expected to
  hold their own travel document
